CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 一次；曾经；一度；一旦；一回

word_group.brief_definition: (用于故事的开头)从前, 很久以前
突然, 忽然；一起, 同时
一年一次；一年一度；每年一次
一周一次；每周一次；一个星期一次
最终地, 最后地, 彻底地, 一次了结地
极少地；难得地；破天荒地
嫡堂（或嫡表）兄弟姐妹的子女

bilingual.source: Once people get Zika, they won't get it again.
bilingual.target: 一旦人们感染了寨卡病毒，他们不会再次感染。

bilingual.source: Once it had landed safely on the ground, the cat felt smug.
bilingual.target: 一旦安全着陆，猫就感到得意。

bilingual.source: Once matter has decayed, it can't go back to the way it used to be.
bilingual.target: 一旦物质腐烂，它就不能恢复原样。

bilingual.source: Once people had money to spend, they used markets to buy things.
bilingual.target: 一旦人们有了钱，他们就用市场来购买东西。

bilingual.source: "Anyway, once you've seen one crazy fish, you've seen them all."
bilingual.target: “反正，一旦你看到一条疯狂的鱼，你就见过所有的了。”

bilingual.source: Once you have a good idea of what you want to do for the party, start writing the draft of your plan.
bilingual.target: 一旦你对派对的安排有了好主意，就开始写计划草稿。

bilingual.source: For once you have tasted flight, you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards.
bilingual.target: 一旦你尝试过飞行，你会带着仰望天空的目光行走在地球上。

bilingual.source: Once a species is listed as endangered, it is against the law to harm or kill that animal.
bilingual.target: 一旦某个物种被列为濒危物种，伤害或杀死该动物就是违法的。

bilingual.source: Both the Patriots and the British promised to free enslaved men who fought for them once the war was over.
bilingual.target: 爱国者和英国人都承诺，一旦战争结束，就会释放为他们作战的被奴役者。

bilingual.source: "Once we spread out into space and establish independent colonies, our future should be safe," he said.
bilingual.target: 他说：“一旦我们扩展到太空并建立独立的殖民地，我们的未来应该是安全的。”

list.abstract: 《曾经拥有》（Once）是由约翰·卡尼执导并担任编剧，格伦·汉塞德、玛可塔·伊尔格洛娃等主演的爱情音乐剧情电影，于2007年3月23日在爱尔兰上映。 该影片主要讲述了卖花姑娘（玛可塔·伊尔格洛娃 饰）与街头音乐家（格伦·汉塞德 饰）在爱尔兰首府都柏林因音乐而结缘的浪漫爱情故事。 2007年，该片获第23届圣丹斯电影节世界电影单元最佳剧情片奖。2007年12月，影片获得芝加哥影评人协会奖(CFCA Award) 最佳影片提名。
《Once》是一首叶炫清作词、作曲并演唱的歌曲，于2022年6月19日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: The thing about surgery is, once you're in, you're in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 手术一旦开始，就不能停下。

yingyinNormal.en: But once you open the box, you've voided the warranty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是一旦开箱，保修单就作废了。

yingyinNormal.en: Once all these pieces are in position... Triple Yahtzee?
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦所有的宝石都集齐了…然后就同花顺吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Once you've got these on here, don't move them for at least 10 minutes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦你到了这一步，放置10分钟不要移动。

yingyinNormal.en: Once you'd agreed she would have got pregnant, don't you worry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一旦答应， 她就会想办法怀上，这你不用担心。

yingyinNormal.en: Once risen, the trencher bakes for about half an hour at 220 degrees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦发酵完毕，放到220度的烤箱里半个小时。

yingyinNormal.en: Revenge is not good once you're done. Believe. It's better to forget.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦开始复仇，就不会有好结果的，相信我，还是忘了好。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know, she'll never go for the kid once she gets a peek at this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好说，一旦让她瞄到我的话，她肯定不会去找那小孩了。

yingyinNormal.en: Once you've opened your heart, you can't close it again. I'm kidding! Of course you can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦敞开心扉，就再也无法关上了。我是在开玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Once they get to the Euphrates, they'll have a choke hold on northern Syria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦他们进入幼发拉底河流域，他们将扼住北叙利亚的命门。

yingyinNormal.en: Once the investigation is complete, we'll be able to share the actual computer simulations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 调查一旦完成，我们将公开具体的计算机模拟结果。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on. Chandler's funny, sophisticated, and he's very lovable, once you get to know him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德风趣、成熟，一旦了解他，就会觉得他很可爱。

yingyinNormal.en: And once I get there, well, I'm gonna save all these pages for all the adventures I'm gonna have.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦我到了那里，我就把将来的探险日志写在后面。

yingyinNormal.en: Once an idea has taken hold of the brain, it's almost impossible to eradicate. An idea that is fully formed, fully understood, that sticks. Right in there somewhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦扎根 根深蒂固盘亘脑海。

yingyinNormal.en: Mmm. I don't know. It's pretty, but there's really nothing to do once it gets dark.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道，这很美，但这里一旦天黑真的就没什么可以做了。

yingyinNormal.en: Once the wolves have finished with him, Belle will have no one to take care of her, but me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦狼群把他吃了，贝儿就会无依无靠，只能跟着我了。

yingyinNormal.en: But once you wake up, whatever you've done will take hold and become history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是，只要你一旦醒来，你所做的任何事都会固定下来，变成历史。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Once you're fluent, You'll have a billion more people to annoy instead of me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？一旦你学得溜了，你就又多了十几亿的人去烦，我就解放了。

yingyinNormal.en: I love you. You better. Get your fix now, because once we get into the office...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我爱你，最好是这样哦，现在腻歪个够吧，因为一旦我们去办公室...

yingyinNormal.en: And once the moon is mine, the world will give me whatever I want to get it back!
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦月球落到我手里，想要我交出来的话 整个世界都得满足我的任何条件！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Manufacturing is not the economic engine that it <highlight>once</highlight> was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造业不再是曾经的经济引擎。

examination_example.sentence: As a linguist <highlight>once</highlight> said, "You can get people to think it's nonsense at the same time that you buy into it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如一位语言学家曾经说过的那样，“你可以让人们认为它是胡说八道的同时相信它。”

examination_example.sentence: King Juan Carlos of Spain <highlight>once</highlight> insisted "kings don't abdicate, they die in their sleep."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西班牙国王胡安·卡洛斯曾坚称“国王不会退位，他们会在睡梦中死去。”

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> on the calendar, I protect this time like I would a doctor's appointment or important meeting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦列入日程表，我会像预约医生或重要会议一样保护这段时间。

examination_example.sentence: I truly believe that <highlight>once</highlight> you get that first word out everything else will just flow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真的相信，一旦你说出第一个字，其他的一切都会水到渠成。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>once</highlight> we rip off the band-aid, tuck our smartphones in our pockets and look up, it doesn't hurt so bad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，一旦我们撕下创可贴，把智能手机塞进口袋，抬头向上看，就不会那么痛了。

examination_example.sentence: Today is no different, with academics, writers, and activists <highlight>once</highlight> again warning that technology is replacing human workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天也不例外，学者、作家和活动家再次警告说，技术正在取代人类工人。

examination_example.sentence: According to the National Center for Education Statistics, nearly 80 percent of college students end up changing their majors at least <highlight>once</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据国家教育统计中心的数据，近80%的大学生最终至少换过一次专业。

examination_example.sentence: Buy all your clothes at <highlight>once</highlight> with a stylist instead of shopping alone, one article of clothing at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和造型师一起一次性买下你所有的衣服，而不是一个人购物，一次买一件衣服。

word_usage.usage:
once用作副词，表示“一次”时，是频度状语，通常放在句末。例：
I have been there once.
我到过那儿一次。

once用作副词，表示“曾经;一度”时，是表示不确定时间的副词，通常放在行为动词之前，助动词、情态动词、be动词之后，有时也可以放在句首。例：
I once went around the world.
过去我周游过全球。

once用作连词，指“一……就；一旦”，引导时间状语从句，从句用现在时表将来。例：
Once you start，you will never give up.
一旦你开始了，就不要放弃。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: J. K. Galbraith <highlight>once</highlight> wrote, "Faced with a choice between changing one's mind and proving there is no need to do so."
examination_example.sentence_trans: J. K. Galbraith曾经写道，“面临改变主意和证明没有必要这样做之间的选择。”

word_usage.usage:
once，as soon as两者均为从属连词，引导时间状语从句，都表示主句的动作紧跟在从句的动作之后发生。
once除表时间外，还表示条件，一般译作“一旦...就...”。
as soon as强调的只是时间，译作“刚...就...”或“一...就...”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (用于故事的开头)从前；很久以前

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> you get beyond the initial learning curve, knitting and crocheting can lower heart rate and blood pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦你超越了最初的学习曲线，编织和钩织可以降低心率和血压。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> we're on the path of growth, we can continually move through the seasons of transformation and renewal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦我们走上了成长的道路，我们就可以不断地经历转变和更新的季节。

examination_example.sentence: What people were like when they came in had greater consequence than what happened <highlight>once</highlight> they were there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们进来的时候是什么样子，要比他们到了那里之后所发生的事情有更大的影响。

examination_example.sentence: It is not as healthy as <highlight>once</highlight> thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它并不像人们曾经认为的那样有益健康。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> upon a time, they weren't even boxes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 曾几何时，它们甚至不是盒子。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>once</highlight> served in a fire department.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他曾在消防部门服役。

examination_example.sentence: Nearly two-thirds of us grab fast food <highlight>once</highlight> a week, and we get almost 25% of our daily calories from snacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中近三分之二的人每周吃一次快餐，我们每天几乎25%的热量来自零食。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> again, it seems we have a lot to learn from dogs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再次，看来我们有很多东西要向狗学习。

examination_example.sentence: "For <highlight>once</highlight>, we are the ones who are blocking the traffic, " he says delightedly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “这一次，我们是堵塞交通的人，”他高兴地说。

examination_example.sentence: It informed the local police at <highlight>once</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它立即通知了当地警方。

examination_example.sentence: She called the police at <highlight>once</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她立刻报了警。

examination_example.sentence: Trigger its built-in alarm system at <highlight>once</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 立即触发其内置报警系统。

examination_example.sentence: The brain can process just so much at <highlight>once</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大脑可以一次处理这么多东西。

word_usage.usage:
once，as soon as两者均为从属连词，引导时间状语从句，都表示主句的动作紧跟在从句的动作之后发生。
once除表时间外，还表示条件，一般译作“一旦...就...”。
as soon as强调的只是时间，译作“刚...就...”或“一...就...”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Some of your interests may not appear to be connected but, <highlight>once</highlight> you explore their depths, you discover that they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的一些兴趣可能看起来并不相关，但一旦你深入探索，你会发现它们是相关的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> the drink is gone, the straw will take centuries to disappear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 饮料一喝完，吸管却需要几个世纪才能消失。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>once</highlight> having met and liked them, we think how terrible it would have been, had we missed the chance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但一旦我们认识了他们并喜欢上了他们，我们就会想，如果我们错过了这个机会，那将是多么可怕的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Most page turners are piano students, although Ms Raspopova has <highlight>once</highlight> asked her husband to help her out on stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管拉斯波波娃也曾请自己的丈夫到舞台上帮忙翻乐谱，但多数翻谱员是钢琴初学者。

examination_example.sentence: We provide full furnishings, like donated kitchen equipment and furniture items, for the new homes of people who were <highlight>once</highlight> homeless.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们为曾经无家可归的人们的新家提供全套家具，如捐赠的厨房设备和家具。

examination_example.sentence: That is only evidence that traditions <highlight>once</highlight> existed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是传统曾经存在的唯一证据。

examination_example.sentence: Today, they are <highlight>once</highlight> again a familiar sight, playing roles that are often just as important for the community as their original purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，他们再一次成为人们熟悉的景象，扮演着与他们最初的目的一样重要的角色。

examination_example.sentence: I started reading books on my own before age 5 and my mother took me to the public library <highlight>once</highlight> a week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在5岁前开始自己看书，我妈妈每周带我去一次公共图书馆。

examination_example.sentence: As you may know already, it's a required meeting <highlight>once</highlight> a week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能已经知道了，这是每周一次的必修课。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 一周一次；每周一次；一个星期一次
一年一次；一年一度；每年一次

examination_example.sentence: While eating and drinking, we talked about the beautiful forest we <highlight>once</highlight> had.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 边吃边喝的过程中，我们聊起了曾经拥有的美丽森林。

examination_example.sentence: There was <highlight>once</highlight> a farmer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从前有一个农民。

examination_example.sentence: I was <highlight>once</highlight> asked about my Chinese dream.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我曾经被问到我的中国梦。

examination_example.sentence: Every <highlight>once</highlight> in a while, floodwaters rise higher than a house, ruining (泡坏) many things in the house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每隔一段时间，洪水就会涨得比房子还高，把房子里的很多东西都泡坏了。

examination_example.sentence: Two  years later, the small restaurant had <highlight>once</highlight> again become a big food company, thanks to the businessman's words.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两年后，这家小饭馆，在商人的口中，再次成为了一家大食品公司。

examination_example.sentence: Try to drink some water at least <highlight>once</highlight> every hour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尝试至少每小时喝一次水。

examination_example.sentence: Why not clean up your room at <highlight>once</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么不立即打扫房间？

examination_example.sentence: Be ready to act at <highlight>once</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 准备好立即行动。

examination_example.sentence: You'd better go to see a doctor at <highlight>once</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你最好马上去看医生。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> a dish comes, instead of lifting our chopsticks, we take out our mobiles and click.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦一道菜来了，我们不是拿起筷子，而是拿出手机点击。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> dishes come, we take out our mobile phones and take photos instead of lifting our chopsticks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦菜来了，我们就拿出手机拍照，而不是拿起筷子。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> you are in another country
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦你在另一个国家

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> upon a time, there was a hippo living in a river next to a big tree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从前，有一只河马住在一棵大树旁边的河里。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Once</highlight> upon a time, there was a( tree which wanted to become a treasure box.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从前，有一棵（树）想变成一个宝箱。

word_usage.usage:
once，as soon as两者均为从属连词，引导时间状语从句，都表示主句的动作紧跟在从句的动作之后发生。
once除表时间外，还表示条件，一般译作“一旦...就...”。
as soon as强调的只是时间，译作“刚...就...”或“一...就...”。
